Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
Iter_rem_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Fix Rs_wf (fun _ : set => set) (Iter_rem_F m z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
R3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
not_exds_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)
P1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)
not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s
not_exds_Iter_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), let n := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
not_exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds (Ds s z) z
exds_Rs_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> Rs (Ds s z) s
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
exds_Ds_exds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> exds s z
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), x <> z -> exds s z < -> exds (Ds s x) z
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
exds_Ds_diff : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> x <> z
not_exds_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s1 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z -> ~ exds s2 z -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
not_exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s2 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
fmap_rec : forall P : fmap -> Set, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
exds_set_minus_eq : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z /\ ~ exds s2 z < -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
set_rect : forall P : set -> Type, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_ind : forall P : set -> Prop, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s

```coq
unfold R3. intros. unfold P1. intros. unfold Iter_rem_aux. simpl. rewrite Iter_rem_aux_equation. destruct (exds_dec _ _). 
  * simpl. rewrite <- H. apply not_exds_rem_upb. apply H.
  * apply not_exds_rem_upb. apply H.
Qed.```
